exercise-1-llm-configuration.title: Exercise 1: LLM Configuration
exercise-1-llm-configuration.description: Objective: Understand and set up the base LLM (GPT-4 or Claude) with Dify.

exercise-2-knowledge-ingestion.title: Exercise 2: Knowledge Ingestion
exercise-2-knowledge-ingestion.description: Objective: Connect a vector database and upload test documentation.

exercise-3-ai-chatbot-setup.title: Exercise 3: AI Chatbot Setup
exercise-3-ai-chatbot-setup.description: Objective: Connect RAG with uploaded knowledge for context-aware responses.

exercise-4-advanced-prompting.title: Exercise 4: Advanced Prompting & Relevance Tuning
exercise-4-advanced-prompting.description: Objective: Improve output quality and relevance for software testing queries.

intro.title: Introduction to Testus Patronus
intro.description: Welcome to the Testus Patronus workshop! This hands-on tutorial is designed for the EuroSTAR Software Testing Conference, where you'll learn how to build your own AI assistant using Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) with a focus on software testing use cases.
